notices.notice:
The framework has been changed to .Net 8 from the next update. Please make sure that the runtime is installed before updating. If it is not installed, you will not be able to start.
If you want to update, please click "Yes".

The framework has been changed to .Net 6 from the next update. Please make sure that the runtime is installed before updating. If it is not installed, you will not be able to start.
If you want to update, please click "Yes".
